title: 寻找巧克力MOD 1.1d 老奔溃
author: wind3080
txt_content:
不知道怎么回事，我加了寻找巧克力MOD1.1d，MC老奔溃，各位大虾帮帮忙！！
下面是奔溃信息：
Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Why did you do that?

Time: 15-10-31 下午10:15
Description: Ticking block entity

java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking block entity
        at com.chocolate.chocolateQuest.block.BlockBannerStandTileEntity.func_145845_h(BlockBannerStandTileEntity.java:43)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72939_s(World.java:1939)
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72939_s(WorldServer.java:489)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:636)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:547)
        at net.minecraft.server.integrated.IntegratedServer.func_71217_p(IntegratedServer.java:111)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:427)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer$2.run(MinecraftServer.java:685)
  救命啊！！！！！

replies.author: wsd3
replies.txt_content: 好像是实用村民mod的问题

replies.author: 豪四吾
replies.txt_content: 换新版或者别的版本吧

replies.author: wind3080
replies.txt_content:
豪四吾 发表于 2015-11-1 13:15
换新版或者别的版本吧
大神是什么意思？是这个版本不稳定么？？

replies.author: wind3080
replies.txt_content:
yuezimeizi123 发表于 2015-11-1 16:08
这个mod去末地就会崩
我都没去末地。。。。就是跑着跑着就奔溃了。。。
